content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (4.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (6.0, 0.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing coal in furnaces
- Ensure that there is enough coal in your inventory to insert into the furnaces. Regularly check your inventory and gather more coal if necessary.

### Errors when furnaces are out of fuel
- Monitor the fuel levels in the furnaces. If a furnace is out of fuel, it will not be able to smelt iron ore. Make sure to supply coal to all furnaces that require it.

### General tips for managing furnaces
- Keep track of the number of iron ore and coal available in your inventory to avoid running into situations where furnaces cannot operate due to lack of resources.
